message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I appreciate your interest. I could come down to $140. I believe that's a fair price considering the value this product provides.
I'm still interested, but I need to be careful with my budget. How about $80?
